body_html:
Hi Raghuraman:

for tensor2tensor,

Do you have an example upon creating eval mnist graph (without the optimizer) as a pb with tensor2tensor?

So far I use this
/home/frankzhu/TestPrj/tensor2tensor/tensor2tensor/bin/t2t-trainer
--generate_data
--data_dir=~/t2t_data
--output_dir=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist
--problem=image_mnist
--model=shake_shake
--hparams_set=shake_shake_quick
--train_steps=1000
--eval_steps=100
--profile

how to evaluate it I have not found the command.

Thank you very much in advance
Frank

body:
Hi Raghuraman:

for tensor2tensor, 

Do you have an example upon creating eval mnist graph (without the optimizer) as a pb with tensor2tensor?

So far I use this 
/home/frankzhu/TestPrj/tensor2tensor/tensor2tensor/bin/t2t-trainer 
--generate_data 
--data_dir=~/t2t_data 
--output_dir=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist 
--problem=image_mnist 
--model=shake_shake 
--hparams_set=shake_shake_quick 
--train_steps=1000 
--eval_steps=100 
--profile

how to evaluate it I have not found the command.

Thank you very much in advance
Frank
